author: Josh Gerstein
title: Federal prisons start 14-day lockdown to fight virus
description: Judge calls for action to protect vulnerable inmates before it's 'too late.'
content: Limited group gathering will be afforded to the extent practical to facilitate commissary, laundry, showers, telephone, and [computer] access, the Bureaus announcement said. During this time, to the extent practicable, inmates should still have access to prog… [+4811 chars]
